main.name: Sree Charan
main.bio: Hey! Call me Sree, I'm a prior Salesforce developer currently aspiring to become a Full Stack developer. I am currently building two full-stack hobbyist projects based on ReactJS. Please check them below
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details or just have a conversation on ReactJS or anything else :)

resume.skillmessage: I like to tinker with new technologies and my interest in them is more than ever. Building skills in JavaScript, React, Firebase and ApolloGQL

description.positions: Graduate Assistant at Marketing Department | Member of Tableau User Group Steering Committee

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed custom wrappers for platform’s reusable UI library-base by leveraging Google Material-UI, ReactJS. Led the initiative of converting platform’s icon-base to a reusable node package for efficient maintenance and upgrades. Leveraged Azure DevOps to document and fine-grain value-added user stories related to platform's user interface

work.title: Pre-Sales Intern
work.description: Performed competitive analysis, researched trends on various pricing solutions and designed capability maps. Had constant interaction with the Solutions head, Prepared Pre-Sales content on Pricing solutions & Strategy, ERP Data prep. Increased awareness about factors that influence software sales!

work.title: Senior Salesforce Developer and Consultant
work.description: Digital Knowledge Sharing Contributor (1200 outreach on the floor) for few topics. Had a cool mix of experience in Salesforce development and administration, CRM Tech-Consulting. Co-Lead of a Teaching based initiative for two years

skills.name: Apex
skills.description: A Salesforce on-demand, Object Oriented, server-side language that I spend lot of my time with as I was developing custom applications for clients. This taught me basics of OOPS and made me comfortable to learn new languages without intimidation :)

skills.name: Lightning Web Components
skills.description: Brief encounter with the public component-based framework volunteered to work with a friend for a Golf sales/services client.

skills.name: ReactJS
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward.

projects.title: MERN Stack YouTube Clone- WIP
projects.category: Youtube Web App Clone built with React, Context API

projects.title: MERN Stack Amazon Clone WIP
projects.category: Amazon Clone built with MERN (Firebase, ReactJS, NodeJS)

articles.title: ReactJS - A beginner's perspective on web based development
articles.category: Part-1 of series of introductory articles on this awesome library!

testimonials.text: Recent Testimonial: Hey Sree. It was an absolute pleasure working with you and watching you grow during your internship. I know you didn't get to do a lot of application development or GQL work but you made significant contributions to the platform that were highly critical to our success. Your go getting attitude, thirst for knowledge, and optimism will get you super far in your career.
